languages.text: "Возможно, это дела очень давних лет, о которых кроме Леди Теодоры могли знать лишь мой предшественник или прошлый сенешаль. Но мой дед ничего подобного не упоминал, а старого сенешаля я не застала".

"Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, это дела очень давних лет, о которых кроме Леди Теодоры могли знать лишь мой предшественник или прошлый сенешаль. Но мой дед ничего подобного не упоминал, а старого сенешаля я не застала".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal.

"Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal.

"Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal.

"Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

languages.text: 「おそらく遠い昔の事柄で、レディ・シオドーラご自身を除けば、私の前任者か過去の家令長だけが知り得たことでしょう。しかしお祖父様はそのようなことは一度も口にしませんでしたし、私は前の家令長にお会いしたこともありません」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく遠い昔の事柄で、レディ・シオドーラご自身を除けば、私の前任者か過去の家令長だけが知り得たことでしょう。しかしお祖父様はそのようなことは一度も口にしませんでしたし、私は前の家令長にお会いしたこともありません」

languages.text: "Vielleicht handelt es sich hier um längst vergangene Angelegenheiten, von denen nur mein Vorgänger oder ein früherer Truchsess haben könnte – abgesehen von Lady Theodora selbst. Aber mein Großvater hat etwas Derartiges nie erwähnt, und den alten Truchsess habe ich nie getroffen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht handelt es sich hier um längst vergangene Angelegenheiten, von denen nur mein Vorgänger oder ein früherer Truchsess haben könnte – abgesehen von Lady Theodora selbst. Aber mein Großvater hat etwas Derartiges nie erwähnt, und den alten Truchsess habe ich nie getroffen."

languages.text: "Belki de bunlar mazide kalmış hususlardır. Leydi Theodora'dan başka ancak selefim yahut ondan önceki Seneşal biliyor olabilirdi. Ne var ki büyükbabam böyle bir şeyden hiç söz etmedi, eski Seneşal ile de hiç tanışmadım."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de bunlar mazide kalmış hususlardır. Leydi Theodora'dan başka ancak selefim yahut ondan önceki Seneşal biliyor olabilirdi. Ne var ki büyükbabam böyle bir şeyden hiç söz etmedi, eski Seneşal ile de hiç tanışmadım."

languages.text: «Tal vez se trate de asuntos que datan de antaño, de los que solo mi predecesor o un Senescal anterior y la propia lady Theodora fueran conscientes. Sin embargo, mi abuelo nunca dijo nada al respecto y no conocí al antiguo Senescal».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez se trate de asuntos que datan de antaño, de los que solo mi predecesor o un Senescal anterior y la propia lady Theodora fueran conscientes. Sin embargo, mi abuelo nunca dijo nada al respecto y no conocí al antiguo Senescal».

languages.text: “或许这些都是很久以前的事情了。除了西奥多拉夫人本人之外，或许只有我的祖父或前任总领了解这些细节。不过，我的祖父从来没提过这些事情，我也没见过前任总领。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: “或许这些都是很久以前的事情了。除了西奥多拉夫人本人之外，或许只有我的祖父或前任总领了解这些细节。不过，我的祖父从来没提过这些事情，我也没见过前任总领。

languages.text: « Peut-être s'agit-il là de sujets anciens, dont seuls mon prédécesseur ou un ancien sénéchal auraient pu avoir connaissance, à l'exception de la dame Théodora elle-même. Mais mon grand-père ne m'a jamais mentionné une telle chose et je n'ai jamais rencontré l'ancien sénéchal. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps these are matters of long ago, of which only my predecessor or a past Seneschal could have known apart from Lady Theodora herself. But my grandfather never mentioned any such thing, and I never met the old Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être s'agit-il là de sujets anciens, dont seuls mon prédécesseur ou un ancien sénéchal auraient pu avoir connaissance, à l'exception de la dame Théodora elle-même. Mais mon grand-père ne m'a jamais mentionné une telle chose et je n'ai jamais rencontré l'ancien sénéchal. »
